div.h2: QICore Observation Delta Value Set Definition
div.p: Code indicating how the current observation compares to previous observations - e.g., no change, rising trend, decreasing trend, etc...
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/v2/0078
CodeDisplay
BBetter-use when direction not relevant
DSignificant change down
USignificant change up
WWorse-use when direction not relevant
